androidx.wear.widget

Class BoxInsetLayout.LayoutParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout.LayoutParams
      • androidx.wear.widget.BoxInsetLayout.LayoutParams
  • Enclosing class:
    BoxInsetLayout

    public static class BoxInsetLayout.LayoutParams
extends FrameLayout.LayoutParams
    Per-child layout information for layouts that support margins, gravity and boxedEdges. See BoxInsetLayout Layout Attributes for a list of all child view attributes that this class supports.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BoxInsetLayout.LayoutParams.BoxedEdges 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BOX_ALL
      The view will force an inset on all of the edges of the children.
      static int BOX_BOTTOM
      The view will force an inset on the bottom edge of the children.
      static int BOX_LEFT
      The view will force an inset on the left edge of the children.
      static int BOX_NONE
      Default boxing setting.
      static int BOX_RIGHT
      The view will force an inset on the right edge of the children.
      static int BOX_TOP
      The view will force an inset on the top edge of the children.
      int boxedEdges
      Specifies the screen-specific insets for each of the child edges.

      • BOX_NONE

        public static final int BOX_NONE
        Default boxing setting. There are no insets forced on the child views.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(@NonNull
                    Context context,
                    @Nullable
                    AttributeSet attrs)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters. The values are extracted from the supplied attributes set and context.
        Parameters:
        context - the application environment
        attrs - the set of attributes from which to extract the layout parameters' values

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(int width,
                    int height,
                    int gravity)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified width, height and gravity.
        Parameters:
        width - the width, either #MATCH_PARENT, #WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels
        height - the height, either #MATCH_PARENT, #WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels
        gravity - the gravity
        See Also:
        android.view.Gravity

                    ViewGroup.LayoutParams source)

        Parameters:
        source - The layout params to copy from.

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(@NonNull
                    ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams source)

        public LayoutParams(@NonNull
                    FrameLayout.LayoutParams source)
        Copy constructor. Clones the width, height, margin values, and gravity of the source.

        source - The layout params to copy from.

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
